page.title: 05A Typical School Day
page.content: On school days, I get up at 7.30. Then i read the morning paper. At 7.45 I have my breakfast which is a packet of crisps. Then I play with a bouncy ball. At 8 'O'clock I go upstairs to get washed and clean my teeth. I get dressed and brush my hair. I then wait for Sara to call for me. We walk to school and there, we wait on the yard for the teacher. Then we line up. We go into the classroom and read our reading books. Mrs Lawton calls the register. Then Mrs Lawton takes a Maths lesson. We have a rolling time-table. During the week, we do a lot of things such as, Art, English, Maths, Science, Library work, Swimming, P.E. and games. At 12 'O'clock we have lunch in the school hall. School finishes at 3.45.
